name: Walk in the Park
description:
Jump with spacebar. Press spacebar to start the level.

Simple runner platformer game inspired by dog-walking. Make money by walking dogs in the park. You can increase the difficulty by walking multiple dogs at the same time.

Submission for Ludum Dare 40

Theme:  "The more you have, the worse it is"

Tools: Unity, Blender, Gimp, Bfxr

Update: Added download for Windows executable version
